python-shop-sdk 0.2 documentation

Caching

«  Usage   ::   Contents   ::   Run Tests  »

Caching¶

Facets and Categories are always cached! If you enable the extra caching Products and Variants will be also cached.

For caching is pylibmc used. To enable caching fill cache options in your configuration file.

{
    "entry_point_url" : "http://ant-core-staging-s-api1.wavecloud.de/api",
    "app_id": "",
    "app_token": "",
    "app_secret": "",
    "agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/33.0.1750.152 Safari/537.36",
    "image_url": "http://cdn.mary-paul.de/file/{}",
    "product_url": "",
    "cache": ["127.0.0.1"]
}

Starting local Memcached¶

>>> memcached -d -m 512 -l 127.0.0.1 -p 11211 -u nobody

Check if is running:

>>> ps -eaf | grep memcached
